summary: As per request, I\'ve made a charred version of the dragon skeleton.
descriptionHtml:
In response to my \"Dragon Bones and Blood\" re-texture, some members suggested that a charred version may be more appropriate, due to the nature of the dragons\' flesh being burned off after being killed.

So, here you go. :)

This texture DOES affect all dragon skulls and skeletons throughout Skyrim.

As I am not a modder, I do not know how to apply this texture only to killed dragons.

If any modders know how to do so, feel free to alter the file.

It is featured in the following \"Bits and Bobs\" video at 5:26.

[youtube]rwJjsxVDfvI[/youtube]

Just drop the file where your Skyrim \"Data\" file is located and it will replace your current \"dragon skeleton\" texture.

Please Endorse and add pics if you like.

Enjoy.

4/2/12 Version 2.0 is out. 

Grittier and darker with a bit more texture to it.
author: voodoohammer
